entry.title: Next主题配置文件
entry.content: 配置教程##next配置view raw123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113---# next主题用户配置文件keywords: "22g Blog"footer: powered: false icon: 'barcode' copyright: '22g.&nbsp;&nbsp;All rights reserved.' theme: enable: true version: falsemenu: tags: /tags || tags # categories: /categories || th about: /about-me || address-bookscheme: Geminisocial: GitHub: https://github.com/zhao5363 || githubsocial_icons: enable: true icons_only: false transition: truehighlight_theme: nightfont: enable: true global: family: Lato headings: family: Roboto Slab logo: external: true family: "Great Vibes" size: 28 codes: external: false family: "Fira Code',PragmataPro,Monoid,Hasklig,'Source Code Pro" size: 14disqus: enable: true shortname: 22g-1sidebar: position: right b2t: false scrollpercent: truesave_scroll: truefavicon: small: /favicon.ico medium: /favicon.icoavatar: /images/avatar.jpgbusuanzi_count: enable: truemotion: async: false transition: post_block: fadeIn post_header: slideDownIn post_body: slideUpIn sidebar: slideUpIn coll_header: swoopInfancybox: truepace: truepace_theme: pace-theme-flash# 自行修改的，非官方配置canvas_nest: color: 0,0,0 opacity: 0.456 count: 222 zIndex: -1local_search: enable: true top_n_per_article: 5vendors: jquery: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery@2.1.3/dist/jquery.min.js fancybox: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/fancybox@2.1.5/dist/js/jquery.fancybox.min.js fancybox_css: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/fancybox@2.1.5/dist/css/jquery.fancybox.min.css fastclick: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/fastclick@1.0.6/lib/fastclick.min.js lazyload: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery-lazyload@1.9.3/jquery.lazyload.min.js velocity: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/velocity-animate@1.2.3/velocity.min.js velocity_ui: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/velocity-animate@1.2.3/velocity.ui.min.js ua_parser: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/ua-parser-js@0.7.10/dist/ua-parser.min.js fontawesome: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/font-awesome@4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css # algolia_instant_js: # algolia_instant_css: pace: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/pace-js@1.0.2/pace.min.js# 这个pace_css会直接影响加载的样式无视[pace_theme]的配置 pace_css: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/pace-js@1.0.2/themes/orange/pace-theme-flash.min.css canvas_nest: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/canvas-nest.js@1.0.0/canvas-nest.min.js # three: # three_waves# version: 5.1.3

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
